definition: in a playfully devilish manner, showing the cunning or ingenuity or wickedness typical of a devil
details:
adverb
- in a playfully devilish manner
= example: in a playfully devilish manner
= synonyms: devilishly
adjective
- showing the cunning or ingenuity or wickedness typical of a devil
= example: showing the cunning or ingenuity or wickedness typical of a devil
= synonyms: diabolic
- playful in an appealingly bold way
= synonyms: rascally, roguish
